Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseBulkQueryable<ENTITY,​SELF extends DatabaseBulkQueryable<ENTITY,​SELF>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseBulkDeleteBuilder, DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder, DbContextBulkDeleteBuilder, DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
    public interface DatabaseBulkQueryable<ENTITY,​SELF extends DatabaseBulkQueryable<ENTITY,​SELF>>
    Fluently create a statement for a list of objects with a WHERE ... clause, such as UPDATE or DELETE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SELF where​(String field, Function<ENTITY,​?> value)
      Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the SET fieldName = ? clause
      default SELF whereAll​(List<String> fields, Function<ENTITY,​List<?>> values)
      Adds a list of functions that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the SET fieldName1 = ?, fieldName2 = ?, ... clause

    • Method Detail

      • where

        @CheckReturnValue
SELF where​(String field,
           Function<ENTITY,​?> value)
        Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the SET fieldName = ? clause

      • whereAll

        @CheckReturnValue
default SELF whereAll​(List<String> fields,
                      Function<ENTITY,​List<?>> values)
        Adds a list of functions that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for the SET fieldName1 = ?, fieldName2 = ?, ... clause
